description: iD Software released three versions of Wolfenstein 3D. The first, which was a shareware version that included only one episode, stored game data in .WL1 files. The second, which was a registered version that included three episodes, stored game data in WL3 files. The third, which included six episodes, stored game data in .WL6 files.
All versions of Wolfenstein 3D contain nine default game data files. In the three-episode version of Wolfenstein 3D, these files are named:
